mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM k1_view_product_order WHERE productOrderCode = #{productOrderCode};
SELECT LPAD(CAST(MAX(RIGHT(productOrderCode,3))+1 AS CHAR), 3, '0') AS newCodeNum FROM k1_tb_product_order;

SELECT pod.productOrderOngoingCode ,pod.itemName ,pod.productCount ,pod.productPrice ,pod.productShipmentDate ,pod.`COMMENT` FROM k1_view_product_order_detail AS pod WHERE pod.productOrderCode = CONCAT('product_orderCode_', #{productOrderCode})

SELECT po.productOrderCode, right(pod.productOrderOngoingCode,3) AS productOrderOngoingCode, pod.productShipmentDate, po.mainBusinessCode, mb.businessName, po.contractCode, po.clientCode, c.businessName AS clientBusinessName, po.`status`, po.itemName, po.managerName, po.totalCount, po.totalPrice, po.briefs as briefs, po.productOrderDate as productOrderDate, po.productDate as productDate, po.predictProductDate as predictProductDate, po.managerId as managerId, po.managerName, po.regDate as regDate, po.updateDate as updateDate FROM k1_view_product_order AS po INNER JOIN k1_tb_main_business AS mb on mb.mainBusinessCode = po.mainBusinessCode INNER JOIN k1_tb_client AS c on c.clientCode = po.clientCode INNER JOIN k1_tb_product_order_detail AS pod on pod.productOrderCode = po.productOrderCode WHERE po.productOrderCode = #{productOrderCode} ORDER BY pod.productOrderOngoingCode

SELECT RIGHT(po.productOrderCode,3) as productOrderCode, po.mainBusinessCode, po.contractCode, po.clientCode, po.clientBusinessName, po.`status`, po.itemName, po.managerId, po.managerName, po.totalCount, po.totalPrice, po.briefs, po.productOrderDate, po.productDate, po.predictProductDate, po.managerId, po.managerName, po.regDate, po.updateDate FROM k1_view_product_order AS po

SELECT RIGHT(po.productOrderCode,3) as productOrderCode, po.mainBusinessCode, mb.businessName, po.contractCode, po.clientCode, po.clientBusinessName, po.`status`, po.itemName, po.totalCount, po.totalPrice, po.briefs, po.productOrderDate, po.productDate, po.predictProductDate, po.managerId, po.managerName, po.regDate, po.updateDate FROM k1_view_product_order AS po INNER JOIN k1_tb_main_business as mb ON mb.mainBusinessCode = po.mainBusinessCode
po.mainBusinessCode = #{mainBusinessCode}
